      • checkActivityThisSubscription

        public boolean checkActivityThisSubscription(int userId,
                                             int mediaId)
        Method check state of activity Subscription. If Subscription.getDateTo() before current day - return "true", else - "false".
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        mediaId - - Media id
        Returns:

      • getActivityUserSubscription

        public java.util.Optional<Subscription> getActivityUserSubscription(int userId,
                                                                    int mediaId)
        Method get activity Subscription. If Subscription.getDateTo() before current day - return Optional.of(Object) Subscription, else - Optional.empty().
        Specified by:
